title: Wall Street Breakfast June 20: What Moved Markets This Week
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
This is a revamped roundtable format, henceforth called Alpha TALKS, hosted by Nathaniel E. Baker and featuring:

Aaron Task, VP Contributor Content and co-host Seeking Alpha's Alpha Trader podcast;

Brad Olesen, VP News;

Steve Alpher, Managing Editor News, co-host Alpha Trader.

Content Segments (Spotify users can click on the timestamp to link to the start of the segment):

Intro: Another positive week for stocks, but only after the Fed stepped in on Monday (0:50);

Some of the week's big gainers: TA, BBBY, CWH (3:11);

Corporate news and earnings: CCL, LEN (6:55);

Seeking Alpha Content That Caught Our Eye This Week (9:13):

Brad: Spotify adds a Kardashian to the Rogan lineup and Inexpensive steroid shows treatment benefit in severely ill COVID-19 patients;

Aaron Retirement Strategy: A Safe Dividend King With An Upside Potential Of Nearly 50%, by Regarded Solutions and Prepare For A Second Wave With These 5 Undervalued Low-Risk Dividend Aristocrats, by Jonathan Weber;

Steve: Fed to buy corporate bonds;

Nat: Amazon: A New Narrative Is About To Unfold, by Michael Wiggins de Oliveira;

What could give investors pause? Geopolitical risk? (19:19)

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
